casebody.data:
BARTON
v.
WHITE, et al. No. 684P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. L. Phillip Hornthal, III, Elizabeth City, for Sue Perry White. David R. Pureza, Elizabeth City, for Earl Ray Godfrey/Sonny Godfrey.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for appointment of counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
